title: why it says i need to be level 7 to use gameplay fourm?
body:
i am already higher than level 15.. and i am still not able to use the fourm it says i am level 1 but i am not, i am level 15
My in game username is manoffacts

replies.body: Sometimes an account will need to get sync up to the boards, and as a result show the proper level.  Your post here seems to have updated your level.  Let me know if you still have issues posting!
